!
! Extreme Networks VOSS MLT Configuration
! Multi-Link Trunk with LACP
!
snmp-server name "vsp-mlt-01"
!
! Create VLANs
vlan create 10 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 20 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 30 type port-mstprstp 0
!
! MLT Configuration
mlt 1 enable
mlt 1 name "Uplink-MLT"
mlt 1 member 1/49,1/50
mlt 1 encapsulation dot1q
!
mlt 2 enable
mlt 2 name "Server-MLT"
mlt 2 member 1/47,1/48
mlt 2 encapsulation dot1q
!
! MLT Interface Configuration
interface mlt 1
   no shutdown
   lacp enable
   lacp key 1
exit
!
interface mlt 2
   no shutdown
   lacp enable
   lacp key 2
exit
!
! LACP Global Configuration
lacp enable
lacp aggregation-wait-time 30
!
! VLAN Membership for MLT
vlan members 10 mlt 1,mlt 2 portmember
vlan members 20 mlt 1,mlt 2 portmember
vlan members 30 mlt 1 portmember
!
! Physical Port Configuration for MLT
interface GigabitEthernet 1/49
   lacp enable
   lacp key 1
   lacp aggregation enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/50
   lacp enable
   lacp key 1
   lacp aggregation enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/47
   lacp enable
   lacp key 2
   lacp aggregation enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/48
   lacp enable
   lacp key 2
   lacp aggregation enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
